name: Notice.AAA6.ClaimantIntent.RequestJudgePlan.RequestedCCJ.Claimant
titleEn: You requested a County Court Judgment against ${respondent1PartyName}
titleCy: Rydych wedi gwneud cais am Ddyfarniad Llys Sirol yn erbyn ${respondent1PartyName}
descriptionEn:
You rejected the repayment plan.

When a judge has made a decision, we’ll post a copy of the judgment to you.
descriptionCy:
Rydych wedi gwrthod y cynllun ad-dalu.

Pan fydd barnwr wedi gwneud penderfyniad, byddwn yn anfon copi o’r dyfarniad drwy’r post atoch chi.
